posts.post_content:
I would like to trade the Marr card below, preferably for a similarly conditioned 1890 NL card of either Duryea or Foreman. The card sits in an SGC 40 holder.

Thanks!

Kevin

I don't have the cards you are looking to trade for, but if you are ever interested in selling put me on the top of your list.
